document_data.name: Stig
document_data.mainbody:
'''Stig''' was a male [[human]] [[fighter]] and a bouncer at the tavern called the [[Furniture's Fate]] in the town of [[Thunderstone]] in [[Cormyr]] in the late 1360s [[DR]].

He was very strong.

When brawls broken out, [[Boffo Arglebargle Cosgrove Bullwubble II|Boffo]] the tavern owner often had Stig lift him up and hurl the gnome into the fray.
